title: Test story generation
description: Implement automated test story generation functionality to create sample user stories for testing, demos, and development purposes
iWant: to generate test stories automatically for testing and demonstration purposes
soThat: I can quickly populate the system with realistic sample data for development and QA workflows
acceptanceCriteria: System generates realistic test stories with valid INVEST criteria
Generated stories include proper hierarchy with parent-child relationships
Test data includes acceptance criteria, story points, and component assignments
Generation supports configurable parameters for story count and complexity
Generated stories follow consistent naming and formatting conventions
User interface provides simple controls for triggering story generation
System handles bulk generation without performance degradation
Generated test data can be easily cleared or reset when needed
technicalNotes: Consider using templates or AI assistance for generating realistic story content. Include cleanup utilities for test data management.
